content: 3 - *kfb repeat from * to end of round rrrruuuufffffffflllleeee knit to the length referred to in the ruffle section of the table measure from previous increase round ggggaaaarrrrtttteeeerrrr hhhheeeemmmm ffffiiiinnnniiiisssshhhhiiiinnnngggg round 1 purl sew in ends and block skirt round 2 knit thread elastic through the waistband and sew round 3 purl hole closed with the tail from the cast on cast off © button & bean designs 2013 p iro ue t t e tw irls pa ge | 6 sssskkkkiiiirrrrtttt lllleeeennnnggggtttthhhh cccchhhhaaaarrrrtttt ssssiiiizzzzeeee sssseeeeccccttttiiiioooonnnn 1111 sssseeeeccccttttiiiioooonnnn 2222 sssseeeeccccttttiiiioooonnnn 3333 rrrruuuufffffffflllleeee iiiinnnncccchhhheeeessss ttttoooottttaaaallll lllleeeennnnggggtttthhhh iiiinnnncccchhhheeeessss iiiinnnncccchhhheeeessss iiiinnnncccchhhheeeessss iiiinnnnccccllll hhhheeeemmmm &&&& wwwwaaaaiiiissssttttbbbbaaaannnndddd 6666mmmm 1 75 1 75 1 75 1 7 75 11112222mmmm 2 2 2 1 25 8 75 11118888mmmm 2 25 2 25 2 25 1 25 9 5 22224444mmmm 2 5 2 5 2 5 1 5 10 5 3333yyyy 2 75 2 75 2 75 1 75 11 5 4444yyyy 3 3 3 2 12 5 5555yyyy 3 5 3 5 3 5 2 14 6666yyyy 4 4 4 2 15 5 7777yyyy 4 4 4 2 5 16 8888yyyy 4 5 4 5 4 5 2 5 17 5 9999yyyy 4 75 4 75 4 75 2 5 18 25 11110000yyyy 5 5 5 2 5 19 11111111yyyy 5 5 5 3 19 5 11112222yyyy 5 25 5 25 5 25 3 20 the copyright of this pattern remains with the author - rachel evans button and bean designs it is intended for personal use only please do not share the pattern with anyone or claim the design as your own if you have personally hand-knitted the item feel free to do with it as you wish including selling the item if you have any questions please contact me on ravelry under the username craftyweewifey or email me at craftyweewifey@yahoo co nz © button & bean designs 2013
